name: Voxel Zombies Survival
description:
A small arena game where you pick a weapon and try to survive killing as many zombies as possible. All of this in voxel art stile!

For create the art style i largely used MagicaVoxel, i also make video about them in my youtube channel: http://bit.ly/AlexVoxelYT

The game engine used is Unity!

Commands:

-Shooting: Left Mouse Click

-Movement: Arrows and WASD

-Run: Shift

-Put away and pull out the gun(you will run faster): E

Haven't watched a video yet? http://bit.ly/AlexVoxelYT
